issue.title: [Rust] Improve documentation for StringDictionaryBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11216](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11216). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I find myself trying to remember the exact incantation to create a `StringDictionaryBuilder` so it should be a doc example
